detail_desc: 5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and slim legs.

Ankle-length jeans in washed cotton denim with an extra-high waist, pleats at the top and a detachable belt with metal D-rings. Relaxed fit with a zip fly and button, side and back pockets, and tapered legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Leggings in soft, stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Trousers in soft twill made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and gently tapered legs with a tab and button. Wide ribbing at the waist for optimum comfort.
Leggings in stretch, denim-look jersey with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and flared legs.

Straight-cut, ankle-length coat in a soft Tencel™ lyocell and wool blend with narrow notch lapels and concealed buttons down the front. Long sleeves with buttons at the cuffs, flap front pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
Calf-length dress in jersey crêpe with long sleeves and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit lambswool with buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in printed cotton jersey with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Fine-knit cotton cardigan with buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in washed denim with a high waist, buttons down the front and a cut-off, raw-edge hem.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a linen and viscose weave with a regular waist, hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Cotton jersey boxer briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Long-sleeved jumper in a cable-knit cotton blend containing some wool with buttons at the back of one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

prod_name: BOSSE basic CNY OH hood SB
detail_desc: Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Knee-length skirt in a patterned stretch weave with a slight sheen. High waist and a sewn-in wrapover with ties at one side and a concealed zip at the other. Unlined.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Top with long sleeves and ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems. Lined in patterned jersey.

Short-sleeved playsuit in soft jersey with a deep V-neck front and back, a wrapover top and horizontal ties at the back. Seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist and short, wide legs. Overlocked edges around the sleeves and hems.
Top in soft, patterned cotton jersey with short sleeves and a flounce down the front.
Boys' briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined front.
Short skirt in an airy, patterned cotton weave with a high waist and pleats to create width. Concealed zip in one side and pockets in the side seams. Lined.
Baby Exclusive. Short-sleeved shirt in a soft, organic cotton double weave with a round neckline and button placket.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Bustier in an airy, patterned cotton weave with narrow shoulder straps, a V-neck with a tie detail at the front and wide smocking at the back.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.
Jacket in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, front pockets, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Ankle-length trousers in a linen weave with a high waist, zip fly and button and pleats at the front. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and wide, tapered legs.
Fitted denim shirt with a collar, buttons down the front, chest pockets, front pockets and long puff sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Long-sleeved, fitted top in soft, organic cotton jersey with a deep neckline, buttons at the top and a rounded hem.
Textured-knit tights with an elasticated waist.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Court shoes with pointed toes, leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 10 cm.
Hat in braided paper straw. Width of brim approx. 10 cm.
Fabric-covered, USB 2.0 charging cable suitable for iPhones 5/5c/5s and iPhone 6/6s. Length 1 m. The cable is only for charging and synchronisation via a computer.
Fitted top in ribbed jersey with a slight sheen. Square neckline, long sleeves, and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Fitted body in ribbed cotton jersey with a ballerina neckline, short sleeves and lined gusset with press-studs.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in imitation leather with a high waist and zip fly with a button.
Fitted, padded jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim, a small stand-up collar and zip down the front. Zipped side pockets and inner ribbing at the cuffs.
Boxer shorts in soft cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Dress in sweatshirt fabric with a flounced trim at the top, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. The cotton content of the dress is organic.
Boys’ briefs in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined front.
Long-sleeved shirt in a patterned organic cotton weave with a collar, press-studs down the front and yoke with a motif at the back. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, and a rounded hem.
T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey with a text print on the front. Press-stud on one shoulder (not in sizes 2-4Y).
Jacket in woven fabric with a chest pocket and flap welt pockets at the front. Imitation suede elbow patches, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent.
Knee-length sports shorts in fast-drying mesh with an elasticated drawstring waist. Unlined.
Oversized top in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with dropped shoulders and long sleeves.

V-neck nursing dress in a softly draping jacquard weave with a unique nursing feature, decorative gathers at the shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Top layer with covered buttons and ties at the waist. The design includes a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Relaxed-fit blouse in a crinkled viscose weave with a V-neck, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

V-neck, non-wired body in lace and ribbed jersey. Padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Lined gusset with concealed press-studs, and a high cut at the back.
Plastic slides with a grained sole.

Soft shell trousers in water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with elastic at the back of the waist and a zip fly with press-studs. Extended waistband with a hook-and-loop fastening, zipped side pockets and reinforced hems. Slim fit with flared legs.
Vest tops in soft jersey with narrow shoulder straps, a small scalloped trim at the top and a decorative bow at the front.
Imitation suede trainers with a lightly padded edge and tongue, and lacing with a detachable faux fur decoration at the front. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Microfibre and lace Brazilian briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
Long-sleeved jumper in fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shorts in cotton piqué with an elasticated, drawstring waist and discreet pockets in the side seams.
T-shirt in premium cotton jersey.
Dress in soft sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves, a belt at the waist and a rounded hem.

Wide, knee-length dress in mesh with a flock print. Round neckline, a small opening at the back with a button at the back of the neck, and long puff sleeves with smocking and a small frill trim at the cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and hem for added width and soft draping. V-neck underdress in jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit, print-patterned cotton with buttons down the front, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Wide blouse in an airy weave with a V-neck, decorative seam at the front and short cap sleeves.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and slightly wider legs.
One-shoulder blouse in a cotton weave with a wide flounce that goes over one shoulder and a narrow strap over the other shoulder. Unlined.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, ties at the sides, overlocked frilled edges and a gathered seam at the back.
Pyjama bottoms in sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication at the waist and tapered legs with elasticated hems. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an appliqué on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Jeans in stretch, supersoft denim. Skinny fit through the hip, thigh and leg. Adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Short, fitted dress in velour with an opening and button at the back of the neck and long sleeves. Collar and cuffs in woven fabric embroidered with sparkly stones.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Aviator-style sunglasses with a decoration on one side. Metal and plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Sports top in heavy jersey with taped details. Mesh-lined drawstring hood, short sleeves with ventilation holes under the arms, a kangaroo pocket, and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Trousers in an airy viscose weave with an elasticated, frill-trimmed waist with a decorative bow, side pockets and elasticated hems.
Chino shorts in washed cotton twill with a zip fly, side pockets, a coin pocket and welt back pockets. Regular fit.

Dress with a knitted bodice and skirt in a cotton weave. Short puff sleeves, a decorative bow at the top, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt with pleats at the top and broderie anglaise at the hem.
Cropped, boxy-style T-shirt in pima cotton jersey. Round, rib-trimmed neckline, dropped shoulders and short slits in the sides.
